title: How to remove the suspended with my account???
body: "This account has been permanently suspended." I have used MK LOL that can change the skins of champions, but only me can see the change. no warning before, the first punishment is permanently suspended??  I really want to play. I will never use any malicious 3rd party programs any more...  what can I do.. please help me...

replies.body: This account has been permanently suspended. So yeah 'permanently' means for ever and they never reverse permanent bans.
